Module com.example.platformerplain

Package com.example.platformerplain.controller

package com.example.platformerplain.controller
Provides controller classes for the game.

The com.example.platformerplain.controller contains classes that manage the flow of the game and handle the user interactions.

This package adheres to the MVC design patterns as it helps in maintaining a clean separation of concerns. The View and Model can be developed and modified independently, making the code easier to be maintained.

    Description
    com.example.platformerplain
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BackgroundManager
    The BackgroundManager class is a singleton that manages the background colour and image of the game.
    EagleController
    Manages the behavior and interactions of eagle, such as movements.
    EndScreenController
    Controls the end screen of the game.
    FireballController
    Controls the creation and management of fireballs.
    GameController
    Controls the game logic and interactions.
    GamePhysics
    Manages the physics interactions and collision detection in the game.
    GameStateController
    Manages the game state transitions and updates.
    GameUpdater
    Updates the game state and handles player movements, collisions, and level progression.
    InfoScreenController
    Controls the behavior of the information screen.
    InputHandler
    Handles the player's input actions.
    LevelLoader
    Loads and initialises game levels and their components.
    MainScreenController
    Controls the main screen of the game.
    MoneyController
    Manages the collection and interactions of money items in the game.
    OptionScreenController
    Controls the options screen of the game.
    PlayerController
    Controls the player's movements and interactions with the game environment.
    ScoreController
    Manages the player's score during the game.
    ScreenBaseController
    Provides a base class for screen controllers in the game.
